subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: In Ciudad Juárez, one of the deadliest cities in the world, the Indios were a miracle, winning their way to the first division of Mexican soccer. But the miracle didn’t last.
snippet: In Ciudad Juárez, one of the deadliest cities in the world, the Indios were a miracle, winning their way to the first division of Mexican soccer. But the miracle didn’t last.
